items.titolo: Chatbot in crisi: la domanda semplice che manda in tilt l’AI
items.descrizione: Un test virale dimostra che i chatbot AI ragionano sulle parole, ma fanno fatica a capire le intenzioni degli utenti. The post Chatbot in crisi: la domanda semplice che manda in tilt l’AI appeared first on Punto Informat

items.titolo: Edge just got a useful AI tool that Chrome doesn't have - here's how to try it
items.descrizione: A new AI-powered feature in Edge uses Copilot to summarize and answer questions about your PDF files directly in the browser.

items.titolo: Google's Gemini 3.1 Pro is here, and it just doubled its reasoning score
items.descrizione: The latest Gemini model makes impressive strides in benchmarks, but forthcoming models could give it a reality check.

items.titolo: OpenAI hires 'genius' OpenClaw creator, but popular AI assistant will remain open source — Sam Altman says creator will work on 'smart agents' in new role
items.descrizione: OpenAI has hired the creator of popular agentic AI tool OpenClaw, but has decided to keep the project open source. Despite its old Claude-inspired name, Anthropic threatened Steinberger with legal action ahead of multipl
